divs: Sighting Detailsme and my brothers was walking from the store on melson avenue in jacksonville florida. when me and my brothers left the store my younger brother noticed the saucer like object above the powerlines.there was no trace or sound or anything so i didnt know it was right above us until he said What is that? and me and my brother started to throw rocks at it..we could hear the rocks hitting the Flat-Black metal.i always thought the ufo was getting power from the power lines but there was no noise or anything to prove that.and while we was throwing rocks at the object it angled twoards the sky and took off at the speed of light.and mean while my older brother and our friends went to hide.every since then its changed my beliefs. i would take a lie detector in front of anyone to prove that i saw a ufo..
trends: There have been 66 other sightings in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around April 14th 1978
Summary: ufo appeared to be getting power from the powerlines 7 witnesses.then took off at the speed of light
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
